page.title: 08SERVICES IN SIBLE HEDINGHAM
page.content: Sible Hedingham is a large village with a lot of different{shops.}There is a{Primary School}which has about 230 children. We have a large {Comprehensive School}which takes children from surrounding villages. We also have a{Fire Station}that covers other villages as well.We have no{Police Station}but we do have a {Doctor's Surgery}which is run by two doctors. The village{library}is open on Tuesday,Thursday and Saturday. If they have not got the book you require they go to a bigger library and get the book for you. Sible Hedingham has 2{Baptist} {Chapels}and a{Parish Church}that was built in 1350. The{Constitutional} {Hall}is used by the Roman Catholics. The local{Bus Company} operate from a large bus garage in the village.
